objects.text: Spacious Design • Faux Leather • Shoulder Strap • Gold Accents

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
The banner features a modern, minimalist product advertisement layout centered around a stylish handbag. It uses a soft gradient background transitioning from light beige to warm taupe, overlaid with decorative horizontal stripes and circles that add elegance and depth. The top showcases a bold title text layer (`heading`) with a supporting subtitle (`subheading`) below it, centered and aligned for balance. The handbag image (`product_image`) is prominently placed at the center, drawing immediate attention. Below, a feature list (`description`) highlights product specifications in italic. The price (`price`) is large and bold, positioned above a call-to-action button (`cta`) layered over a colored rectangle (`cta_background`). 

**Color Palette:**
- #f8e9d9 (Light Peach)
- #e6c7a9 (Warm Beige)
- #d3a87b (Golden Beige)
- #8a6343 (Taupe Brown)
- #6d4c41 (Chocolate Brown)
- #8d6e63 (Muted Rosewood)
- #ffffff (White for text)
- #d4af37 (Gold Accents)
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated ALDO handbag in a warm, muted tan color (#B07C5B) that evokes elegance and versatility. This dominant shade is subtly textured with a crosshatch pattern, offering visual depth without overpowering the design. The bag is accented with polished gold metallic hardware (#D4AF37), including chains, clasps, logo, and decorative charms, which add a touch of luxury and highlight its detailing. The interplay of matte and glossy finishes creates a harmonious contrast. For an advertisement banner, a complementary palette of soft beige (#F5E9DC), deep brown (#5A3E2B), and champagne gold (#E7CBA7) would enhance the product’s refined appeal.
